name: Sesame Street: Elmo Saves Christmas (Full Frame)

reviews.name: Sesame Street: Elmo Saves Christmas (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: My son loved Elmo when he was a toddler and he would have watched this movie every day if I let him! He is five now and we purchased the DVD since our old copy was VHS, and he still enjoys it even now. This is a great Christmas movie, especially if your little ones like Elmo.
reviews.title: Sweet little movie

reviews.name: Sesame Street: Elmo Saves Christmas (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: Great movie for all ages. I enjoy watching this one myself!
reviews.title: Love this movie!

reviews.name: Sesame Street: Elmo Saves Christmas (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: My 3 1/2 year old daughter and her friend love this movie so much. I have to replace it, they tried to watch it without me and couldnt get it out of the case it broke. they should make kid movies with kid friendly cases.
reviews.title: kids love this one

reviews.name: Sesame Street: Elmo Saves Christmas (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves this movie, great investment.....
reviews.title: Great For Kids

reviews.name: Sesame Street: Elmo Saves Christmas (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: My 18 mo. old grandson is fascinated with Elmo right now and he loves this DVD and all the music.
reviews.title: Excellent for 18 months and Up
